original_text: As soon as it became dark, the believers in Thessalonica sent Paul and Silas away to Berea. When they arrived in that town, they went to the Jewish meeting place.
korean_text: 밤에 형제들이 곧 바울과 실라를 베뢰아로 보내니 그들이 이르러 유대인의 회당에 들어가니라

sentences.original_text: As soon as it became dark
the believers in Thessalonica sent Paul and Silas away to Berea
sentences.korean_translation: 데살로니가에 있는 믿는 사람들이 바울과 실라를 베뢰아로 보냈습니다

sentences.original_text: When they arrived in that town
they went to the Jewish meeting place
